person.persName: Friedrich Bertsch (Cincinnati, Ohio, lithographer and lieutenant (U.S.A.) )

body.p: Cincinnati, Ohio, lithographer and lieutenant (U.S.A.). Native of Germany. Married Margaret Bertsch. Father of Max Bertsch and Helena Bertsch. Lithographer in Cincinnati, Ohio in 1860. Enlisted in Company A Ninth Ohio Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as a sergeant in April 22, 1861. Served in Company B of the Ninth Ohio Volunteer Infantry as Second Lieutenant from May 27, 1861 to February 7, 1862. Promoted to First Lieutenant of Company B of the Ninth Ohio Volunteer Infantry from February 7, 1862 to September 20, 1863. Served as the commander of Company B from September 20, 1863 to June 7, 1864.
